## Overview

Regular moth trapping surveys are conducted in the Nature Discovery Garden to monitor lepidopteran diversity and abundance, contributing to long-term biodiversity monitoring efforts.

## Objectives

- Monitor moth species diversity and abundance
- Track seasonal and annual population changes
- Identify rare or notable species
- Contribute to citizen science and public engagement
